title: Sailors in Japan
creator_credit: Australia. Navy Office. Directorate of Public Relations
brief_description: The visit to Japan of the aircraft carrier Melbourne and destroyer Derwent. Scenes of the crews in Tokyo, Kure and Hiroshima showing visits to many points of interest.
